list.name: ENERGIZE
list.description: Jessie can repair her gun turret for x of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.
list.descriptionHtml: Jessie can repair her gun turret for x of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.

list.name: SHOCKY
list.description: Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs' range after a bounce is x% of normal range.
list.descriptionHtml: Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs' range after a bounce is x% of normal range.
